text: Raymond Wells (1880–1941) was an American actor, screenwriter and film director of the silent era.Goble p.324 He is also sometimes credited as Raymond B. Wells. ==Selected filmography== * Old Heidelberg (1915) * Kinkaid, Gambler (1916) * The Hero of the Hour (1917) * The Saintly Sinner (1917) * Fighting for Love (1917) * Mr. Dolan of New York (1917) * The Hand at the Window (1918) * The Yankee Señor 1926) * The Unknown Cavalier (1926) * Trails of Adventure (1933) * Contraband (1933) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1880 births Category:1941 deaths Category:American male film actors Category:Film directors from Illinois Category:Screenwriters from Illinois Category:People from Anna, Illinois Category:20th-century American screenwriters
title: Raymond Wells
